title: So very slow.
review: It's a movie made today but with the same flaws of a movie 40 years old. The plot in the end feels incomplete and the questions unanswered in the first movie remain still in this one. The visual and the acting are the high point of this film that still is worth to watch.

title: visually stunning
review: Good movie about Armstrong and the moon landing. I was surprised by how affected I was by this film. It was so intimately and beautiful and humanly filmed.

title: I probably would not have liked it as much.
review: I really wanted to love this movie because I absolutely adore Elton John, but I just found it to be another story about the struggles of a rising artist. On the opposite hand, I still managed to like it. I think that it was creative and carried a great story no matter how cliche that might be. The thing that makes me like this movie is that it surrounds a friendship, which I do not think I've seen in any other struggling artist movie. Without that part of the plot and the musical approach to it, I probably would not have liked it as much.

title: a visually cool movie
review: Gravity is a beautiful movie and good experience when watched in the cinema regarding the outstanding realistic CGI, it shows us the endless emptiness and silence up in space. However, the weak plot, acting and dialogue makes the movie very boring

title: Best movie!!!
review: A great movie with an insane plot twist. Brad Pitt and Edward Norton are brilliant together.

title: Great film.
review: I absolutely loved it! the speeches of churchill are a thing that i love, plus the actor who interprets him made an excellent job capturing his essence!

title: It's a good movie
review: Fun movie about plotting to destroy the nazis. Brad Pitt as a commander killing nazis is one of his greatest roles. From start to finish, it is a blast.

title: Suspense. Real. Enjoyed this movie!
review: Great casting choices and gets you biting your nails down to your knuckles without using over the top action

title: This movie is beautiful
review: Love does not have so many excuses. If it cannot be fulfilled, it can only show that love is not enough.

title: Good true story
review: Great movie in the style of 'you are there as it happened'. Just returned from Ireland and toured the town of Derry. So sad to know what those poor people endured back during The Troubles. Glad to see peace returning. Derry is a beautiful city! And so were the people we met there.

title: This movie should never have been made.
review: This movie should never have been made. The only reason it did was because Peele won an Oscar for Get Out and they threw him this deal with no script. The twist at the end is so obvious that I just don't understand why this is getting so much praise. It's mediocre at best. Don't believe the hype; the Hollywood machine needed this movie to be good to get longevity out of Peele but it really is a big miss/mess. Don't even bother. Just rewatch Get Out and hope Jordan remembers how to write.

title: Beautiful Movie
review: Amazing performances by Eddie Redmayne and Alicia Vikander. This is an incredibly emotional movie. There were also some scenes which due to the way they were arranged, made it feel they were comic. Nevertheless, I loved the final scene,

title: phenomenal job
review: Overall the cast did a phenomenal job acting out their characters. As with most detective/mystery movies, there are some twists and turns in the plot that will surprise the audience. One gripe with the movie is that the movie made it quite obvious who we, the viewers, are supposed to hate. The wealthy family was greedy, entitled, arrogant, conniving, and a whole host of other negative attributes, while Martha, the representative of the lower class, was warm, heartfelt, caring, and kind.

title: The Irishman is another crime classic by Scorsese.
review: A relic of a past era in cinema, The Irishman finds Martin Scorsese and company at some of their best as they justify the prolonged runtime and find some new heart in previously visited themes.

title: Amazing performance
review: Powerful and absolutely perfect storytelling. One of the best true story-telling movies.

title: Superb! One of Tarantino's best!
review: I liked this movie a lot more than most people did. I understand how viewers see it as boring and anti-climatic as it is slow at times. However I thought this was one of Tarantino's funniest movies. A very long movie carried by great characters, unique who-dunnit plot, and as always perfect dialogue.

title: Well made film!
review: This movie was much better than I had expected. Interesting and entertaining throughout.great film about abuse and a national story where the Narrative was bad

title: An entertaining film about racism
review: Though it can be preachy and a bit overwritten at times, Crash is still a wonderfully honest and intricate examination on modern racism bolstered by an affecting score and editing, and a tremendous ensemble cast.

title: good movie
review: Though I enjoyed this film a lot, the end completely pulled me out of the movie.

movie_title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
title: this movie is great. funny, dark, and very interesting.
review: One of the best black comedies in history. And relevant even today. Probably will be as long as there are nuclear bombs.

title: Boring.
review: Not gonna watch is again.No plot, no memorable characters

title: A seriously serious and great movie
review: I didnt realize how much of this movie wasnt real. I knew that they didnt have a tiger there, but that almost everything is CGI is awesome, because you dont see it. It seems real although it isnt. The techniques are so far these days that you could just animate movies that look like movies with real people.

title: pretty good movie
review: Great performances.Fascinating movie with great main actress who can carry the whole story. The story is also interesting and unique.

title: Not a well done film,
review: Not a bad movie.but not excellent either.This movie fails to find its balance and therefor fails to find its true emotional potential. Bradley Cooper shines but at times the movie plays out more like a video game than reality.

title: Fun and enough nostalgia
review: Queen's music is the best,I enjoyed this story. I learned a few interesting things about the band and the lead singer. Also, it highlighted their music well. I'd forgotten they had all those songs and how different they are from each other.

title: A few good scenes, but very strange to see batman among a bunch of aliens and CGI.
review: To tell the truth, the best thing to watch in this movie is the first four minutes. You can really feel the despair of the world after losing Superman. But the later style began to look different.

movie_title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
title: great
review: Not only a bright start, it captures what the book wanted to show: action, pain, war, hate and amazing journeys with the perfect storytelling that Peter Jacksom wanted.

title: Survival movie, pretty good
review: A long film that feels arduous at times; but the road for revenge has incredible direction an dcinematography that's gritty, bloody, dirty and, above all else, cold with amazing performances by DiCaprio, Hardy and company.

title: movie based on a true story
review: It's worthwhile enough, but one of those films you know you'd never want to watch again. Hanks plods through and is effective, but isn't that the same for most of his films?The story is as flat as my chest.quite smooth

title: great characters and amazing animation
review: Visuals are amazing and mind-blowing. The story is quite good (but original). It's just an amazing experience, but only good when watched for the first time.

title: Wonderful script with an optimal composition of the actors
review: When I saw the movie.I gave standing ovation to the actress .They really did a great job , especially Jennifer and Bradley they were outstanding in the film.The story has a good meaning that life doesn't go according to plan.Highly recommended!.

title: This movie is awesome to watch.
review: The cinematography is beautiful and the storytelling is fascinating.Gripping and visually spectacular from start to finish. Nolan's most coherent and satisfying film to date.

title: Great performances and a great story made this movie enjoyable to watch
review: Very good insight into the early discovery of AIDS and the drugs available. The FDA are arseholes, its all about money and they've not changed much since. If it wasn't for the guy the films about then so many would have died sooner, including himself

movie_title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
title: This movie. Average.
review: Quite a mix. At times pretty good, but at several points some pretty unpleasant behaviours are ignored, as though inconsequential. And then there's the extensive scenes of no interest to anyone except small children, who probably shouldn't be seeing the carnage and death that pop up not infrequently.

title: Fantastic film
review: Outstanding, gripping suspense yarn. Javier Bardem's performance is epic. My only complaint is the abrupt ending that leaves you disappointed.

title: Not as good as the previous ones.
review: Toy Story 4 was an entertaining continuation of the series, but didn't quite resonate with me the way previous installments did.

title: Too long; not very engaging
review: It had its memorable humor. Olivia Colman was brilliant! It just wasn't a striking and profound movie. It failed to movie me emotionally, it failed to intrigue me. It felt at times bizarre. It felt like I wasted my time watching the film since I couldn't take anything from it.

title: A great movie. Leo & Waltz at their best
review: Jamie Fox gives his best acting performance of all time in this incredible, memorable and dazzling film. I have seen this film many times and it still leaves me speechless every time I rewatch it. it's very bloody and dark and therefore may not be for everyone but if you can handle it this is a must-see film.

title: boring and filled with holes in the script,
review: Not really a very deep story, although there is a way through the movie, it jumps to a very weird ending with the highest point of nonsense when his friend comes to get him.

title: i like it
review: Disney used superb special effects, music, and art to create a beautiful ice and snow world for us. The development of the plot is matched with the character modeling, and the character image is three-dimensional and vivid.

title: Exceptional, breathtaking
review: Truly amazing acting from both stars, emotionally gripping all the way through, writing that feels real; masterpiece

title: Soool goood.
review: A stunning piece of art, it was a truly beautiful film. Something about it emotionally grips you and sticks with you. Timothee Chalamet should have won best actor for this film

title: Interesting Plot, great Acting, Nice story
review: Great example of a movie with no specific story line that still ends up a very immersive experience and manages to really flesh out the characters

title: Not terrible, not great.average
review: A lot of great points and a lot of places where you can think about the future, but at times I was just not having fun. These parts are few but noticeable.Slick indy futurism. Takes itself too seriously. Trys so hard to be genuine that it seems fake.

title: Spielberg master piece & some superb acting.
review: You forget Daniel-Day Lewis is acting. Probably could have been a few minutes shorter but ultimately deeply moving and a magnificent achievement.

title: Eh, not bad, not great either.
review: Pretty average movie. There isn't anything very unique or remarkable about the story.

title: I thought the story was weird
review: Considering this is the Disney princess after Rapunzel, this movie is quite lacklustre.

title: great
review: It's a good ending, Superheroes are also human beings, and they also have birth, old age, sickness and death. Wolverine in his twilight years is really with tenderness in the fireworks.

title: great small drama
review: Though it maybe isn't the most complete look at mental illness, it is packed with great actresses - and even if their roles are predictable, i can't think of another film that's already done it quite like this.

title: Stunning
review: An amazing movie.Enriching and metaphorically relevant premise, beautifully displayed.

title: beautiful shot scenes.
review: Loved this movie. A perfect acting by both Gosling and Stone. The music was perfect. A great love story and also a great story to learn about chasing your dreams.

title: A funny movie
review: Very fantastic the villain is super amazing my favorite character being Brad Pit's Character my favorite part is when they keep shooting Hitler even after he died

title: A great war film
review: Richard Burton and Clint Eastwood. Exciting war movie Set up escape for captured prisoner from Bavarian castle high atop mountain using cable car. Long; could have been shorter. Plot was confusing.

title: Nice
review: It has crispy visuals, good crafted songs and good cast.

title: Ehhh
review: Les Miserables is a movie stuffed with great music and a great plot but feels stretched out and at times loses your attention. The acting is good for the most part and the dialogue is very well written. The set design and costumes are also very convincing. Unfortunately it falls short of its great potential with a long runtime and characters that you can't tell the difference from most of the time. Good but not great

title: Thor is good, but not great.
review: It has bombastic action and compelling performances, but the story lefts something to be desired.

title: An original idea executed shallowly and carelessly.
review: Undeniably beautiful but lacking character development with too many archetypes. The movie spends too much time on its blatant messages and too little on actually creating an investing story.

title: good movie
review: This movie solely belongs to Jeff Bridges due to his witty southern charm and creative music that he brings to the screen. There are a couple familiar themes here, but Crazy Heart delivers enough substance to not only entertain, but inspire as well

title: Its not just a movie its a piece of art.
review: I think it's difficult to make a good-looking suspense film. Although it's nearly 200 minutes long, it doesn't feel lengthy and memorable.

title: good movie
review: From the beginning I knew my destination, and I chose my route accordingly. But am I working toward an extreme of joy, or of pain? Will I achieve a minimum, or a maximum?

title: A good movie
review: I thought it was a beautiful movie highlighting how people can be wonderful to each other. The actors did a splendid job and writing is quite good. I can see why people would either love or hate this movie. To me, I felt I could connect with the characters and story.

title: excellent
review: Bong Joon-ho's Parasite might leave you asking who are the real bottom feeders in the black comedy about social structures. There's plenty of food for thought as this picture is deeper than than what it may seem like on the surface.

movie_title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
title: A good but not a great film.
review: It did have some inventive camera angles and cinematography.A story about an actor who used to be a famous comic book movie star. Michael Keaton is just a wonderful actor, i hope he does more small but awesome roles like this.

title: Almost perfectly done.
review: Amazing movie. Entertaining and educational at the same time. Every American should see this film. It was marketed as a comedy, but in fact it is a very intense drama, extremely well written, acted, and directed.

title: Really boring and pointless
review: A bland, Marvel superhero flick that critics and audiences have escalated into something it's not, e.i., a 'long overdue' and 'empowering' movie.

title: All the Toy Story movies are pretty classic.
review: We have to praise Pixar for reinventing for the 3rd time a movie without being repetitive. The plot has some twists and turns that will shock younger viewers, but not the older ones, the new characters are complex and intriguing and it as more thrilling scenes than any of its predecessors.

title: Great movie.
review: Waititi perfects the balance between making you laugh one moment and cry the next, or both simultaneously. Understandably, a movie about Nazis and the Holocaust is going to divide critics. However, the director shows the idiocy of the Nazi ideology. It will sit comfortably next to Spike Lee's Blackkklansman, raising questions about identity and acceptance that are deeply relevant today.

title: like it
review: This movie shows why Joaquin Phoenix is such an amazing actor - he has incredible range. In Joker, he was brilliant as an intense, disturbed villain and in Her he is brilliant as a completely different character. Scarlett Johansson has only a speaking role but her interaction with Joaquin's character makes this one fascinating film. Unpredictable and thought-provoking.

title: Visually stunning
review: It is a fantastic action film filled with spectacular visuals, sounds and score. The movie is missing an impactful story to be an instant masterpiece.

title: Great movie.
review: Amazing cinematography and acting from Andrew Garfield! Must watch! Watching this I felt like I was there, laughing and crying with the characters, making this real and unforgettable.

title: Excellent movie! Great performances by Wahlberg and Bale!
review: An enjoyable watch and well done is all aspects but some of the details are inaccurate to the real life events and that's what lets it down

title: Amazing and inspiring. Great storey and well acted by all involved
review: Thoroughly entertaining! Damon brings a very likable character to the screen that the audience will root for. The Mars sequences are visually stunning.

title: Wonderful performances
review: The fighter is a great boxing drama with great acting from Christian bale mark Wahlberg and Amy Adams along with a great story
